Most Illustrious Sir

Having obtained exemptions from the service of the 1st Line, as the following ranks of the 2nd Cavalry Corps have completed their engagement time: José Coutinho de Almeida, Jeremias José Pinho, Antônio Soares de Oliveira, Francisco de Quevedo, Francisco Rodrigues de Morais, João Antônio Granada, Daniel José de Araújo, and José Bernardino de Oliveira; and as all will reside in this department, may Your Lordship please

God keep Your Lordship Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, General Commander of Police of the Boqueirão Department. Headquarters in Bagé, October 4, 1841. Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre, 1st Deputy of the General Chief of the Army Staff.

Secretariat of the Presidency of the Republic General Chief of Police of the Boqueirão department, of the 1st Deputy of the General Chief of the Army Staff.

Office of the 1st Deputy of the General Chief of the Army Staff, dated October 4, received on the 29th of the same month, concerning the men discharged from the 1st Line.
